tool_description: Random Util API(s) used for your application.
name: Utils
title: Utils

api_list.name: Form Data Insert
api_list.description:
Send over the dataset you want to receive email notification about. Use this endpoint to integrate with your static forms.

Email, Subject, and Dataset are all required.
Dataset is a dynamic object of the property and values you want to capture based on your application.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://utils4.p.rapidapi.com/v1/forms/data-insert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "utils4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://utils4.p.rapidapi.com/v1/forms/data-insert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "utils4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
